name: ANTILIGHT Demo v0.7
description:
HOTFIX NOTES:

-Added hotkey and tutorial information in-game.  It's floating text.
-Added healing item.  It recharges at checkpoints.
-Reduced the number of enemies.
-Added hitting your sword on solid objects, even makes a little tink noise

THIS IS ANTILIGHT ITS A GAME FOR PEOPLE WHO THOUGHT DOOM 3 WAS TOO VISIBLE OR THAT DARK SOULS DIDNT HAVE ENOUGH SKELETONS.

  • "Doesn't run on my computer" -IGN
  • "The developer should just get a real job" -Gamestop
  • "When are you moving out" -Mom

It -should- launch for you.  If it doesn't, I would really appreciate it if you would share the error message with me so that I can try to fix it.  Thank you very much.  :)

Graphics settings are now much more reasonable.  Medium by default.

If you make it to the 'demo end' message you're officially cool.
